div.bibl: Saloniki, May 19, 1923. THOSE WHO SPREAD THE RUMOR THAT THE PROBLEM OF THE GREEK ORTHODOX CHURCH HAS NOT YET BEEN SOLVED DO NOT SPEAK THE TRUTH.

body.p: p. 3.. Among the Greek communities of the United States a few servants of the sinister dynasty of the Glyxvourges, who in the past have worked for the destruction of the homeland, have now turned against Greek Orthodoxy, distorting the facts and perverting the truth.

By spreading rumors that the ecclesiastical problem has not yet been solved, they are attempting to cause confusion. Today we are publishing two official documents which prove that the decree formerly in force has been repeated, and the Greek Orthodox Church of America is now governed by the Ecumenical Patriarchate of Constantinople.
